original: 由張角、張寶、張梁等人所領導之太平道教眾，遍及天下。起義時，教眾身繫黃巾為號，殊不畏死，令全國七州二十八郡大亂！
text: The Taiping Taoists led by Zhang Jiao, Zhang Bao, Zhang Liang and others spread all over the world. At the time of the uprising, the people wore yellow turbans as their name, and they did not fear death, causing chaos in the 28 counties of seven states!
